experience: You and Kevin both know Jaime Neufer and Brooke Spain

Senior business analyst role, supporting the business intelligence needs for the company.  Writing queries in MySQL and creating reports in PHP-based corporate portal. Lead analyst for the company's Tableau reporting solutions platform.

Senior business analyst role, supporting the business intelligence needs for the company.  Writing queries in MySQL and creating reports in PHP-based corporate portal. Lead analyst for the company's conversion from MySQL data warehouse to Hadoop cluster.

Lead business analyst role, supporting the business intelligence needs for the company.  Lead analyst for Oracle Business Intelligence (OBIEE 10g and 11g) system and data warehouse.  Supervising team of 2; reporting analyst and CRM administrator/BI reporting analyst as well as team of 2 third party resources for ETL engineering and 1 third party resource for data warehouse design.  Project management of enterprise KPI dashboard, early warning system (fraud prevention) scorecard and incremental data loading initiatives.

Business Analyst role, in collaboration with the executive leadership team for Facilities Maintenance Services (FMS), developed solutions using database queries with MS Access, MS Excel and Visual Basic to extract business intelligence data from the Archibus/Siemens CMMS SQL Server database to measure and trend FMS department performance, efficiency and adherence to regulatory requirements. Advised the team how to utilize the information gleaned in order to make sound decisions on resource allocation, budget requirements and achieve higher levels of customer satisfaction. Led and facilitated requirements gathering JAD sessions. Developed CMMS documentation standards, guidelines and processes for system end users to ensure data integrity/consistency and streamline workflows.
